title: Simulation/VR-Based e-Learning Program Development and Operational Strategy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and intermediate-level understanding of scientific theories
context.additional_context: Utilizing VR simulation tools in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments, providing continuous feedback through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Analyze national and organizational factors (culture, readiness, infrastructure) for e-learning program development
Design and operate effective VR simulation content in a technology-constrained environment (primarily smartphone-based)
Apply an e-learning development process integrating learner characteristics, instructional models, and technological elements

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
